#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
int t; cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int n=0,q=0;
cin>>n>>q;
int arr[n][n];
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
cin>>arr[i][j];
}
while(q--)
{
int search=0; cin>>search;
int i=0;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
{
if(arr[i][j]==search)
{
cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
i=n+1;break;
}
}
}
if(i==n)
cout<<"-1"<<endl;
}
cout<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
